title: idhaya veeNayin
sahitya:
idhaya vINaiyin ediroliyE en

iniya ninaivenum kaDalin alaiyE

(idhaya)

anupallavi

kaniyamuda gamaka naLinamudan kamazhum

iniya isai inba madhu rasamum pozhiyum

(idhaya)

caraNam

sAgaramum ponga nAgamum neLindADa

rAga bhAva swara layamuDan nAda

yOga nilai koNDu kavi idaya mANDu

bhAgyam tarum lalita sangIta kalaiyE

(idhaya)
